long_description: With place settings for 4, the REI Campware Group Tableware set equips your family for a fine dining experience on your next camping trip. Set includes 4 polyproylene cups with insulating neoprene sleeves, 4 polyproylene plates, 4 polyproylene bowls and a mesh storage sack. Rugged polypropylene plastic resists breaking and can withstand boiling water; polypropylene is 100% BPA free. Efficient square shapes maximize surface area and nest neatly together for simple storage in the corner of a cooler or backpack. Food scraps slide right off the smooth plastic for quick clean up. Color-coded pieces prevent mix-ups at the campsite. Neoprene sleeves on the cups provide a sure grip and help insulate hot or cold beverages; sip from the corners of the cups to avoid spills. Hand wash in hot water with mild detergent; do not microwave.
short_description: With place settings for 4, the REI Campware Group Tableware set equips your family for a fine dining experience on your next camping trip.
